scripts.dev: nextdev=$(which next); if [ -z "$nextdev" ]; then pnpm exec next dev; else next dev; fi
scripts.build: nextbuild=$(which next); if [ -z "$nextbuild" ]; then pnpm exec next build; else next build; fi
scripts.start: nextstart=$(which next); if [ -z "$nextstart" ]; then pnpm exec next start; else next start; fi
scripts.lint: nextlint=$(which next); if [ -z "$nextlint" ]; then pnpm exec next lint; else next lint; fi
